description:
Are you subscribed to Disney+, loyal Theorist? If so, you may not be able to sue Disney for getting hurt, losing a limb, or even dying. No, we're not kidding around, and we want to share this tragic story in the hopes that something like this never happens again.
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers:  Forrest Lee, Justin Kuiper
Editors:  Gerardo Andrés Mejía Torres, Danial "BanditRants" Keristoufi, AbsolutePixel, Tyler Mascola
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman

title: Film Theory: Is Disney+ Worth Signing Your Life Away?
